name: 王貞淑
objective:
依據「大專校院推動創新創業教育計畫 (EC-SOS)」開設，目的為強化學校產學、育成組織的鏈結，轉換創新知識，落實學校提供學生創業團隊及新創企業資金、課程與諮詢，並提供創業團隊企業見習機會，實踐新創孵化機制，逐步建構、活絡校園創新創業生態圈，鼓勵學生勇於嘗試、大膽創新。
Most of the start-up classes are talk on paper, but not this class. This class will teach you the most practical lessons ex, Facebook advertising, videocasting, and crowdfunding, etc. This class will invite the accountant to help teams establish a company and will be close before we end this semester. Make sure the student have the whole and complete start-up experience to increase the success rate in the future.
